metadata.synopsis: A tiefling scout from the Druid Grove hides and observes as a Githyanki war party massacres some Flaming Fists. The tiefling may warn the player that they are too weak to take on such opponents, before running off.

45.speaker: Ellyka
45.text: What are you doing?! Hold up, before they see you, mragreshem!
45.context: NodeContext: mragreshem = infernal for 'shithead'. Pronounced mragRESHem.

77.speaker: Player
77.context: NodeContext: Turns to look at the chokepoint

66.speaker: Ellyka
66.text: What, apart from the dragon? Look...
66.context: NodeContext: Turns to look at the chokepoint

55.speaker: Ellyka
55.text: That lot are swarming all over the bridge. I don't know what they want, but it can't be good.
55.context: CinematicNodeContext: Tiefling points to/camera cuts to bridge and gith raiders.NodeContext: Referring to a bridge a short distance away. Some gith raiders have barricaded it.

47.speaker: Ellyka
47.text: I'm going to find another way around. You ought to do the same.

73.speaker: Ellyka
73.text: I doubt a fight against them would go your way.

42.speaker: Ellyka
42.text: ... unless you're looking for a fight, that is.

35.speaker: Player
35.context: NodeContext: Hrasting pronounced hur-RAST-ing. Common language equivalent of damned/fucking,

67.speaker: Ellyka
67.text: Nobody. Just another hrasting fool trying to get to Baldur's Gate in one piece.
67.context: NodeContext: Hrasting pronounced hur-RAST-ing. Common language equivalent of damned/fucking,

11.speaker: Player
11.text: I might've been concerned, had I the slightest idea who 'they' are...
11.context: CinematicNodeContext: Tiefling points to/camera cuts to bridge and gith raiders.

68.speaker: Ellyka
68.context: CinematicNodeContext: Tiefling points to/camera cuts to bridge and gith raiders.

61.speaker: Player
61.text: Whatever you just called me, I didn't like the sound of it. Watch your tongue.
61.context: CinematicNodeContext: Tiefling points to/camera cuts to bridge and gith raiders.NodeContext: Hrasting pronounced hur-RAST-ing. Common language equivalent of damned/fucking,

43.speaker: Ellyka
43.text: Got more important things to watch than my hrasting tongue. Look...
43.context: CinematicNodeContext: Tiefling points to/camera cuts to bridge and gith raiders.NodeContext: Hrasting pronounced hur-RAST-ing. Common language equivalent of damned/fucking,

59.speaker: Player
59.text: You're the mragreshem for taking that tone with me.
59.context: CinematicNodeContext: Tiefling points to/camera cuts to bridge and gith raiders.

33.speaker: Ellyka
33.text: Spare me. There's bigger problems right now that my manners. Look...
33.context: CinematicNodeContext: Tiefling points to/camera cuts to bridge and gith raiders.

17.speaker: Player
17.context: CinematicNodeContext: Tiefling points to/camera cuts to bridge and gith raiders.NodeContext: 'That lot' being a band of gith warriors guarding a nearby bridge.

10.speaker: Ellyka
10.text: Listen - avoid the bridge. I doubt a fight with that lot would go your way, no offence.
10.context: CinematicNodeContext: Tiefling points to/camera cuts to bridge and gith raiders.NodeContext: 'That lot' being a band of gith warriors guarding a nearby bridge.

54.speaker: Ellyka
54.text: I'm getting out of here. There's got to be another way to Baldur's Gate. Good luck.

64.speaker: Ellyka
64.text: What? You going to try get past that lot? Better you than me.
64.context: CinematicNodeContext: Tiefling points to/camera cuts to bridge and gith raiders.NodeContext: 'That lot' being a band of gith warriors guarding a nearby bridge.

49.speaker: Ellyka
49.text: Hrast, another one! Keep back, flatface - I know how to handle myself!
49.context: CinematicNodeContext: Ellyka is immediately defensive, brandishing a dagger at the gith player.NodeContext: Hrast pronounced hur-RAST-ing. Similar to damn/fuck in common language.

76.speaker: Player
76.text: Take it easy, I'm only disguised as a gith.
76.context: NodeContext: Hrasting pronounced hur-RAST-ing. Common language equivalent of damned/fucking,

46.speaker: Ellyka
46.text: What? Why...? Never mind. I don't want to know.
46.context: NodeContext: Hrasting pronounced hur-RAST-ing. Common language equivalent of damned/fucking,

26.speaker: Ellyka
26.text: So... you not looking to make trouble for me, are you? Whatever you are?
26.context: NodeContext: Hrasting pronounced hur-RAST-ing. Common language equivalent of damned/fucking,

56.speaker: Player
56.context: NodeContext: Hrasting pronounced hur-RAST-ing. Common language equivalent of damned/fucking,

53.speaker: Ellyka
53.text: ... good. I've enough trouble as it is - look at that lot down there.
53.context: NodeContext: Hrasting pronounced hur-RAST-ing. Common language equivalent of damned/fucking,

40.speaker: Ellyka
40.text: Those things you're masquerading as. Armed to the teeth. And they've a dragon.
40.context: NodeContext: Hrasting pronounced hur-RAST-ing. Common language equivalent of damned/fucking,

70.speaker: Ellyka
70.text: I was counting on crossing that bridge and heading to Baldur's Gate. To safety.
70.context: NodeContext: Hrasting pronounced hur-RAST-ing. Common language equivalent of damned/fucking,

63.speaker: Ellyka
63.text: Now I've got to find another way around. If you're smart, you will too. You're no match for that lot.
63.context: NodeContext: Hrasting pronounced hur-RAST-ing. Common language equivalent of damned/fucking,

52.speaker: Ellyka
52.text: Now I've got to find another way around. Take your chances against that lot if you like.
52.context: NodeContext: Hrasting pronounced hur-RAST-ing. Common language equivalent of damned/fucking,

25.speaker: Ellyka
25.text: Don't follow me - find your own way.
25.context: NodeContext: Hrasting pronounced hur-RAST-ing. Common language equivalent of damned/fucking,

5.speaker: Player
5.context: NodeContext: Hrasting pronounced hur-RAST-ing. Common language equivalent of damned/fucking,

2.speaker: Ellyka
2.text: Nobody. Just another hrasting fool trying to stay alive. There's plenty of us around.
2.context: NodeContext: Hrasting pronounced hur-RAST-ing. Common language equivalent of damned/fucking,

27.speaker: Player
27.text: Seems you have good survival instincts - maybe you should join me instead.

12.speaker: Ellyka
12.text: I go my own way. Alone.

60.speaker: Ellyka
60.text: That's how you want it... fine.

82.speaker: Ellyka
82.text: You're not like that lot at the bridge. I reckon I can handler you... come on!

41.speaker: Ellyka
41.text: Let's see if you're actually as tough as your disguise makes you... come on!

18.speaker: Player
18.text: Lower your weapon. I shall let no istik stand between me and my rightful cleansing.
18.context: NodeContext: Hrasting pronounced hur-RAST-ing. Common language equivalent of damned/fucking,

29.speaker: Player
29.context: NodeContext: Hrasting pronounced hur-RAST-ing. Common language equivalent of damned/fucking,

34.speaker: Ellyka
34.text: Your hrasting friends are swarming all over the bridge down there.
34.context: NodeContext: Hrasting pronounced hur-RAST-ing. Common language equivalent of damned/fucking,

16.speaker: Ellyka
16.text: I won't let you warn them.

14.speaker: Player
14.text: It's a disguise. I'm not really a gith.

58.speaker: Ellyka
58.text: Actually forget it. I need to get moving; there has to be another way to Baldur's Gate.

72.speaker: Ellyka
72.text: I'd keep clear of that lot on the bridge unless you think your disguise'll fool them.

0.speaker: Ellyka
0.text: That lot on the bridge are out for blood. Hope your disguise holds, if you try to get past.

30.speaker: Player
30.text: I am Lae'zel of K'liir. You will let me pass.

57.speaker: Player
57.text: If there are gith at the bridge, they're nothing to me.

15.speaker: Ellyka
15.text: ... all right. I'm leaving. I have to get to Baldur's Gate. Don't follow. And not a word to them.

75.speaker: Player
75.text: I have kin nearby? I should seek them out.

13.speaker: Player
13.text: First and last warning - lower that weapon.
13.context: InternalNodeContext: This node if the player has the REALLY_GITHYANKI tag

32.speaker: Ellyka
32.text: I'll drop it when you're dead.

6.speaker: Ellyka
6.text: Your friends at the bridge are too much for me to take on... but I reckon I can handle you.

8.speaker: Player
8.text: I have no interest in harming you, unless you force my hand.
8.context: InternalNodeContext: This node if the player has the REALLY_GITHYANKI tag

50.speaker: Ellyka
50.text: ... aren't you with that other lot? Down at the bridge? The ones with the dragon?
50.context: CinematicNodeContext: Tiefling gestures to/camera highlights the chokepoint githyanki.

79.speaker: Player
79.context: NodeContext: mragreshem = infernal for 'shithead'. Pronounced mragRESHem.

81.speaker: Ellyka
81.text: All right. Maybe we don't have a problem then. Maybe.

39.speaker: Ellyka
39.text: That bridge was going to be my passage to Baldur's Gate. To safety. Now I've to find another way.

44.speaker: Ellyka
44.text: I'm leaving. Don't follow. Don't tell them you saw me.

28.speaker: Ellyka
28.text: They're out for blood. Unless you're in good standing with them, I'd keep clear.

24.speaker: Ellyka
24.text: They're out for blood. I hope you're in good standing with them.

31.speaker: Player
31.text: They may be my kin. I will investigate.
31.context: NodeContext: mragreshem = infernal for 'shithead'. Pronounced mragRESHem.

19.speaker: Player
19.text: I am Lae'zel of K'liir. You will let me pass.
19.context: NodeContext: mragreshem = infernal for 'shithead'. Pronounced mragRESHem.

80.speaker: Ellyka
80.text: Then we've a problem. I can't have you running off to tell your friends about me.
80.context: NodeContext: mragreshem = infernal for 'shithead'. Pronounced mragRESHem.

51.speaker: Ellyka
51.text: That lot are too much for me to take on... but I reckon I can handle you, mragreshem.
51.context: NodeContext: mragreshem = infernal for 'shithead'. Pronounced mragRESHem.

74.speaker: Ellyka
74.text: I'm going to have to be sure you stay quiet, mragreshem.
74.context: NodeContext: mragreshem = infernal for 'shithead'. Pronounced mragRESHem.

62.speaker: Player
62.text: Calm yourself. I am not who you think I am.
62.context: InternalNodeContext: This node if the player is Planar and looks githyanki, but is not in fact githyanki.

65.speaker: Player
65.context: NodeContext: mragreshem = infernal for 'shithead'. Pronounced mragRESHem.

69.speaker: Ellyka
69.text: Come on, mragreshem! I'll take my chances against you than your friends on the bridge!
69.context: NodeContext: mragreshem = infernal for 'shithead'. Pronounced mragRESHem.
